content: Unlike with most sports recognized by the International Olympic Committee, where competition can be "mixed" (for all, regardless of gender) or accessible only to men or only to women, in chess women can compete in an "open" division (including the World Chess Championship) but they also have an exclusively female championship.
translations: ita:A differenza della maggior parte degli sport riconosciuti dal Comitato Olimpico Internazionale, dove la competizione pu√≤
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
